TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but testudines go extinct. 

 

I wish bugs never had a reason to persist ecologically.

Your wish is granted; soon your neighborhood is full of discarded trash, tree limbs, food waste, dead animals - basically everything that bugs eat.

I wish @Andem's avatar wasn't pixelated...

Granted. You'll NEVER forget the expression in his eyes.

I wish high-speed internet was free for all.

Granted; high speed Internet is now free for everyone on the Earth (The U.N. has now decided to impose a universal electricity usage tax to pay for it, though)...

I wish I had another diet coke...

Granted, but you can't have it because your on a diet. 

I wish that people posted more.

Granted, but they go on posting sprees that dwarf yours, @max_creative!

I wish I saw a compelling reason to go to Dres.

DRES DRES DRES WHOO!!! Oh, it's you. 

Granted, this. 

I wish people appreciated Dres.

Granted, it is appreciated but not as much as Laythe.

I wish for something interesting to happen when KSP gets to version 1.21

Granted, it is SQUAD shutting down.

 

I wish the addiction I've had to Minecraft lately would stop.

Edited April 19, 2016 by DolphinDude3

Granted, you overcome your addiction to minecraft. Who has time for minecraft? You gotta get on that street corner and panhandle enough scratch to feed that new meth addiction.

I wish someone wouldn't corrupt this wish.

Granted, but since you wished for nothing other than for the wish to not be corrupted you get nothing.

 

I wish that... I could think of something to wish for.

You come up with something to wish for, but it's already someone else's turn.

 

I wish for world peace

Granted.  Unfortunately the secret to world peace was locked inside the mind of a lemur and while developing the technology to allow her to communicate this to humans, the door was opened for all creatures to communicate their thoughts telepathically at all times.  While war no longer exists, peace and quiet is a thing of the past...

I wish I had a good book to read.

Granted. However, the book is so good that you forget to eat and/or drink, and waste away within days.

I wish that it was sunny today.

Granted, you are transported to Moho. Very sunny there! 

I wish that I wasn't out of likes today.

Granted, you are out of posts instead. Forever.

 

I wish I cold explore Europa's oceans.

Granted you are very cool when you explore Europa's oceans and you get hypothermia. 

I wish whoopstootall base would stop falling off the mountain.

Wish granted; but you forgot to put dive planes and ballast tank valves on your submersible and are now stuck on the bottom of Europa's oceans.

I wish I could have ten more wishes!

Granted, you get -10 wishes and you can't post ten times today. 

I wish more people joined the kommunity space station.

Granted. Someone installs a life support mod and everyone goes inactive because I play nice.

I wish for a very, very cold bottle of coke.

Granted, they use liquid nitrogen. 

I wish I had no homework tonight.

Granted, but you have a metric ton of homework to do tomorrow.

I wish for my interplanetary station to do as well as I expect it to.

It does, but because you are so focused on it doing well, you miss a SOI transition on one of your other ships and the Kraken attacks.

I wish that the KSP forums would update for me.

Edited April 19, 2016 by spacebrick3

Granted, then your computer crashes from people going abosultly nuts over 1.1. 

WHOO HOOO 1.1!!!!!!! 

I wish my rocket had a rear mounting point in the back so when I get home and update to 1.1 I can put an inflatable heat shield on it.

Granted, but that function leaves no space for engines.

I WANT A MILLION DOLLAR$
